header.title: User IP Logs
header.description:
This mod will log all unique ip's from all registered users as they log in.
To avoid redundant logging the mod only records unique IP's for each user. If a user log's on with an IP that they have no previously logged in with, the new IP will be recorded.
The mod add's a new section to the logs area in the ACP which allow's you to very easily view the User IP Logs.

changelog.change: First public release. Skipped Beta and went straight to RC.
First official release. Mod accepeted into the MODDB. Changed title from 'Log Users IP' to 'User IP Logs'.

Fixed an issue discovered by stokerpiller which was allowing banned users to access the board. The problem was my mod was using $result which was already in use but I never noticed and it wasn't caught in validation. The fix is simple, replace the var name with a more descriptive one.

action-group.diy-instructions:
After uploading all the mod's files and doing all the file edits, run user_ip_logs_installer.php from your site. An example would be http://www.example.com/user_ip_logs_installer.php .
After the installer has finished, the install is complete and you should delete the user_ip_logs_installer.php file from your site.
